headline: Strategic Project Manager | Marketing Planning Specialist | Cross-Regional Team Leader
about:
Gestión de Proyectos Estratégicos y de Planificación de Marketing con más de 15 años de experiencia en empresas globales de tecnología y consultoría. 

☎️ Puedes llamarme cuando…
- Un proyecto necesite estructura, claridad o simplemente avanzar.
- Haya que convertir ideas sueltas en un plan sólido, con principio, medio y fin.
- Quieras simplificar lo complejo y hacerlo escalable.
- Busques resultados sin perder el orden, la lógica ni la creatividad en el camino.
- Necesites pensar dentro, fuera o incluso romper la caja.

Me especializo en convertir el caos en claridad, en conectar equipos y en ejecutar con propósito.
Disfruto tanto de diseñar estrategias como de llevarlas a cabo.
Y sobre todo, me apasiona trabajar con personas que creen que siempre hay una mejor forma de hacer las cosas.
topSkills: Comunicación • Trabajo en equipo • Aptitudes para hacer presentaciones • Microsoft Office

experience.description:
Organización integral de eventos.
Elaboración y redacción de presupuestos. Presentación de informes y reportes, mailing y otras publicaciones para clientes.

Colaboración con la apertura y desarrollo de las áreas de atención al cliente y gestión de redes sociales durante el Startup de la compañía.
Coordinación del equipo de producción, conformado por 5 redactores y 2 diseñadores gáficos.
Gestión eficiente del desarrollo creativo de las ofertas. Corrección de estilo, seguimiento de la propuesta comercial y pauta publicitaria en la página.
Seguimiento del calendario comercial.
Orientación a objetivos a nivel individual y del equipo. Presentación de informes de productividad.
Desarrollo de campañas de RSE a nivel país.
Manejo a nivel usuario avanzado de la plataforma Magento.

Organización integral de eventos propios de la firma, siendo estos de posicionamiento de marca, de relacionamiento y de capacitación. Coordinación de agenda. Contratación de proveedores - Merchandising
Coordinación de sponsoreo en eventos externos a la firma.
Implementación y desarrollo de Acciones de Responsabilidad Social Empresaria.
Redacción de reportes, house organ, mailing y otras publicaciones internas. 
Corrección de estilo.
Posicionamiento de marca a través de pautas publicitarias en los principales medios de comunicación, y seguimiento de las mismas.
Relacionamiento con Cámaras binacionales y del sector.

Tipeo y corrección de balances anuales y trimestrales de clientes.
Tipeo y corrección de cartas convenio y cartas comerciales.
Desarrollo y redacción de propuestas y presentaciones de la firma hacia nuevos clientes.

education.degree: Licenciatura en Ciencias de la Comunicación

certifications.title: Data Science @Cisco Generative AI Green Belt 2024

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Marketing Data Strategy Leader | M.S. Business Analytics | USAF Veteran
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 20, 2025, ✨ Sarah worked with Ana Paula on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I have had the pleasure of working closely with Ana Paula, and she is truly an incredible asset to any team. She dives in headfirst, quickly identifying broken processes and implementing sustainable, organized improvements that make a lasting impact. Ana Paula is legendary for her ability to create everything from SharePoint sites and PowerPoint decks to comprehensive Asana projects, always delivering exactly what is needed. Beyond her impressive skills, she is one of the kindest people I've ever met. But don't mistake her kindness for hesitation. She will always give you her honest opinion, and you'll be better for it.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Strategy & Planning Leader | Helping Teams Execute Better | Driving KPI Execution & Cross-Functional Ops | Marketing Ops | Asana Ambassador | Cisco
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 13, 2025, Luis worked with Ana Paula on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the privilege of working alongside Ana for over two years, both of us serving as Strategy & Planning Managers and often stepping in as unofficial project managers. Ana is one of those rare people who not only gets things done but ensures they’re done right — every time.

Her organizational skills are second to none. She has an exceptional ability to plan and schedule every step of a project, making sure nothing slips through the cracks. If you gave Ana a task or a responsibility, you could instantly have peace of mind knowing it would be handled with care, attention to detail, and on time.

Beyond her skills, what makes Ana stand out is her genuine dedication to the work and the people she works with. She consistently brings clarity, structure, and calm to complex situations, which made her an invaluable partner in every initiative we tackled together.

Any team would be lucky to have her — and I’d jump at the chance to work with her again

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: AI Marketer | Digital Marketer | Organizadora de eventos corporativos | Lic. en PR |  Emprendedora
receivedRecommendations.description: Conozco a Paula de mis años de trabajo en Distecna, en ese entonces ella estaba a cargo de marketing para distribuidores y pese a que estábamos en diferentes empresas, trabajamos como si fueramos pares de un mismo equipo. Siempre escuchaba y apoyaba nuestras propuestas de marketing para partners, colaborábamos en los mismos proyectos, como organizar los viajes al Cisco Live y otros eventos/acciones que hemos realizado para partners. Fue un placer tenerla de co-equiper. Ojalá todos tengan una Ana Paula en su equipo!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Marketing Manager
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 23, 2021, Jennifer worked with Ana Paula on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Excelente profesional con proactividad extrema que potencia el trabajo diario.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Strategic Growth & Business Leader | SaaS, Fintech & Tech | Global GTM & C-Level Connector. Passionate for building business, not just brands. Member of Comité Mujeres en Tecnología - Chicas FinTech - Femtech Latam.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 19, 2021, Carolina managed Ana Paula directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Tuve el placer de trabajar con Ana Paula como parte de mi equipo por 4 años.
Es sin dudas un gran talento, siempre atenta a los detalles, siempre dispuesta a aprender e ir más allá de su rol, super abierta a capacitar a otros (compañeros y partners). Planifica en base a data analytics, lo cual le permite cuestionar con criterio cada acción antes de llevarla a ejecución , y muy enfocada en métricas de ejecución. 
Ademas de sus skills profesionales, es una gran persona, compañera y amiga, que se hace querer en todos los grupos con los cuales interactúa, permitiéndole de manera natural un gran poder de influencia y liderazgo entre sus pares.
Cualquier equipo y empresa debería estar orgulloso de contar con Ana Paula como profesional.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline:
Gerente Comercial Regional 
America Group IT
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 19, 2021, Adriana worked with Ana Paula but they were at different companies
receivedRecommendations.description:
Con Ana trabajamos en equipo ella desde Cisco apoyando y dando soporte a todas las estrategias de marketing de los canales en los cuales trabaje. 
Super profesional, dedicada, pro activa, expeditiva, todo un éxito su gestión.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Socio en GS Imports SpA
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 16, 2011, Fabrizzio worked with Ana Paula on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
He tenido un placer de conocer a Paula durante el último año trabajando en Groupalia, como parte del equipo y colega de departamento. Paula es una excelente persona y profesional, es proactiva, con gran conocimiento y siempre dispuesta a ayudar a los demás. 

Como líder de equipo, Paula está altamente cualificada por varias razones; siempre ha velado por los intereses del área y los de la empresa. Esto la convierte en un factor importante para el desarrollo de las ofertas diarias, constantemente ofrece soluciones de alta calidad, y siempre da más de lo esperado.

Como colega, ha mostrado una disposición increíble para prestar apoyo al equipo de Chile, siempre respondiendo dudas y exponiendo su punto de vista, siempre muy claro y acertado. Ha demostrado con creces, el gran conocimiento y experiencia que ha adquirido en Groupalia, y en las empresas anteriores por las que ha pasado.

Sin duda Paula es un gran activo para cualquier empresa.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Asistente administrativa
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 15, 2011, Luciana reported directly to Ana Paula
receivedRecommendations.description:
Eficaz, creativa y proactiva. Así es Ana Paula a la hora de llevar a cabo sus obligaciones laborales. Es una mujer con grandes capacidades para trabajar en equipo, que posee un marcado perfil orientado hacia la resolución rápida y efectiva de conflictos.
Su buen humor, inteligencia y calidez son cualidades que destacan en ella y que hacen que trabajar a su lado sea un verdadero placer para sus compañeros.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Consultor de comunicaciones
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 10, 2011, Valeria worked with Ana Paula but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Paula es lider natural. Además de realizar un trabajo impecable, posee un manejo de grupos que se destaca por el vínculo que genera con el equipo que dirige. Excelente profesional, domina el trabajo bajo presión como ninguna y atraviesa las crisis dando contención a todos sus colaboradores. Respetuosa y respetada por todos es, sin dudas,  una gran colega.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Analista de Calidad Microbiológica  - Docente
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 9, 2011, Sabrina worked with Ana Paula but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Ana es una persona muy responsable y dedicada.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: PR / Events Planner
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 9, 2011, Gabriela worked with Ana Paula on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
He tenido la oportunidad de trabajar con Ana Paula durante 9 años desde distintos roles y vínculos; y puedo afirmar con toda seguridad que es una persona sumamente responsable, pro-activa, emprendedora e inteligente. Con su capacidad de docencia y humildad siempre me ha alentado al desarrollo y me ha permitido crecer a su lado.
La recomiendo no sólo como profesional, sino también por su calidad humana y su don de buena persona.
Siempre que tengo la oportunidad, es un placer trabajar a su lado...

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Software developer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: May 13, 2019, Federico and Matías studied together
receivedRecommendations.description:
Con Matías hemos sido compañeros en todo el cursado de la Facultad, por poco más de 5 años.
En todos estos años ha demostrado ser una persona muy comprometida, con grandes capacidades técnicas y analíticas. Está continuamente investigando sobre nuevas tecnologías y mejores prácticas relacionadas a AngularJS, C# y manejo de bases de datos.
Es un gran profesional que mantiene un excelente clima de trabajo y siempre motiva al resto del equipo.
Recomendaría a Matías para todo proyecto Web que involucre estas tecnologías, ya que es capaz de generar soluciones de gran calidad. Es una pieza clave para cualquier equipo.

about:
APTITUDES Y HABILIDADES PERSONALES
-	Habilidades sociales y de comunicación. Excelente trato en relaciones interpersonales y trabajo en equipo.
-       Actitud Proactiva. 
-	Capacidad de trabajo por objetivos. 
-	Actitud flexible en entornos organizacionales cambiantes.
-	Interés en aprendizaje y en la mejora continúa.

EXPERIENCIA DOCENTE

honorsAndAwards.title: Proyectos de Tecnologías para la Inclusión Social
honorsAndAwards.description:
Un grupo de alumnos de la Carrera de Ingeniería en Sistemas de Información de esta Facultad, con apoyo técnico del personal de las Secretarías de Asuntos Estudiantiles y de Extensión Universitaria, implementaron un aro magnético en la Sala de Usos Múltiples de esta Casa de Estudios.
El aro magnético que fue generado a partir de un trabajo práctico de la Cátedra Comunicaciones, permite la transmisión directa de los sonidos por un micrófono especial inalámbrico que emite una señal al receptor de FM conectado al audífono de las personas con hipoacusia, evitando así efectos adversos de la distancia, la reverberación o el ruido de fondo. La investigación fue desarrollada por los estudiantes Marina Rodríguez, Celeste Bertolez y Mateo Pavone y el aro magnético podrá ser utilizado en los eventos que se realicen en la SUM, tales como conferencias, seminarios, cursos, ceremonias, entre otros. De esta manera se convierte en uno de los cuatro ámbitos en nuestra ciudad que cuentan con este novedoso sistema.

honorsAndAwards.title: Proyectos de Tecnologías para la Inclusión Social
honorsAndAwards.description:
Un grupo de alumnos de la Carrera de Ingeniería en Sistemas de Información de esta Facultad, con apoyo técnico del personal de las Secretarías de Asuntos Estudiantiles y de Extensión Universitaria, implementaron un aro magnético en la Sala de Usos Múltiples de esta Casa de Estudios.
El aro magnético que fue generado a partir de un trabajo práctico de la Cátedra Comunicaciones, permite la transmisión directa de los sonidos por un micrófono especial inalámbrico que emite una señal al receptor de FM conectado al audífono de las personas con hipoacusia, evitando así efectos adversos de la distancia, la reverberación o el ruido de fondo. La investigación fue desarrollada por los estudiantes Marina Rodríguez, Celeste Bertolez y Mateo Pavone y el aro magnético podrá ser utilizado en los eventos que se realicen en la SUM, tales como conferencias, seminarios, cursos, ceremonias, entre otros. De esta manera se convierte en uno de los cuatro ámbitos en nuestra ciudad que cuentan con este novedoso sistema.

experience.description:
Ghella Abergeldie JV: Leaders in infrastructure like the Central Interceptor project. As a CAD technician my tasks are:
● Creating accurate CAD drawings from hand sketches, verbal instructions, and site visits.
● Seamlessly integrating and working with the technical team, construction team, design consultants, and subcontractors, to produce and alter drawings.
● Management and organisation of all emergent CAD drawings.
● Thinking creatively and critically to support the project team in the design process, to create sketches and
drawings that work.
● Creating and continually updating project drawings lists.
● Systematically saving sketches and drawings on our CAD server; keeping the server organised; updating project folders and files as jobs progress and revisions are made.
● Exhaustively reviewing and checking sketches and drawings for errors, before being sent out
● Organising and uploading drawings to web-based storage sites/collaboration project sites to share drawings
● Design Engineering as required

A boutique architecture firm with stunning projects worldwide: Ponte Vecchio, Florence's historical center, Murano, Barcelona, Forte dei Marmi. As an all-rounder, I handled design, rendering, documentation, and site management.

A dynamic architecture studio specializing in new residential homes, apartments, and land development. Our projects span diverse locations. My role encompasses design, 3D modelling, rendering, meetings with the client, documentation, and site management.
A reputable construction company handling commercial and residential projects, including apartments and homes. My role involved overseeing design, documentation, and site management.

education.description:
El objetivo del programa es aprender mediante actividades prácticas un método de trabajo eficaz para desarrollar el trabajo de la arquitectura dentro del ámbito laboral, siendo la comunicación una herramienta indispensable.

El programa permite conocer de forma directa distintas experiencias de profesionales de reconocimiento internacional que participan en el postgrado.

headline: Medical & Scientific Communications Specialist | Immunology Lover | Passionate Ailurophile🐈 | Rock concerts fan🎶 | Cycling Enthusiast🚴🏼‍♀️
about:
• I am a curiosity-driven woman who has achieved several lifelong career goals, including completing a PhD as a scientist, fulfilling two research internships abroad and managing a research group of three people for almost 10 years. I have also successfully transitioned from academia to industry recently.
• My professional aim is to leverage my expertise in immunology and scientific communication skills in medical affairs roles or related positions, such as medical writing, particularly in medcoms or scientific writing, to significantly contribute to patient care.
• My personal goal is to relocate and live in my dream destination, and I am so proud to say that I have recently accomplished this goal ❤️.
• I stand out for my resourcefulness and my exceptional organizational skills. My proactive approach ensures that I effectively manage and optimize every project I undertake.

Career Achievements:

• Accomplished medical writer and science communicator: published over 20 manuscripts in international peer-reviewed journals and delivered numerous lectures as a professional speaker.
• Internationally-trained research scientist with over 15 years of experience in immunology: extensive background establishing collaborations with physicians, writing, publishing and reviewing scientific manuscripts, speaking at conferences and lectures contributing to scientific discourse and healthcare professional education, mentoring PhD students, and managing research projects.
• Proud university professor with over 15 years of experience in immunology: expert in teaching undergraduate and postgraduate students, effectively translating scientific and medical content for diverse audiences, and staying current with the latest research and developments.

experience.position: Medical Writer MedComms. Scientific Editorial Project Specialist
experience.description:
As part of the medical communications and editorial team, I collaborate across different stages of medical writing and scientific publishing workflow. My role includes scientific editorial support, scientific manuscript editing, end-to-end publication process management and scientific content development. I contribute to execution of medical-scientific projects, ensuring clarity, accuracy, and compliance with journals and industry standards across all deliverables.

#MedicalWriting #MedComms #ScientificCommunication #ContentDevelopment #Research #EditorialPublishing

experience.position: Research Scientist at CONICET (National Scientific and Technical Research Council)
experience.location: Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description:
Achievements and Responsibilities: 
• Relationship development: collaborated closely with key opinion leaders (KOLs) to advance research projects.
• Scientific expertise: demonstrated strong scientific and clinical background with proficiency in data interpretation and medical writing. Skilled in summarizing medical and scientific information in a clear and concise manner. 
• Medical writing: experience in writing, editing, and evaluating scientific and medical content (manuscripts, abstracts, posters, presentations). Published 20+ high-impact scientific publications.
• Scientific communication: presented scientific and clinical data at conferences and medical meetings as a professional speaker for healthcare professionals (HCPs), ensuring clear and accurate understanding of the information. Created educational materials and developed slide decks tailored for healthcare professionals. 
• Project management: led research projects and supervised the work of PhD students and other researchers.

experience.location: Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina

experience.position: University Professor at the Immunology Department of the School of Pharmacy and Biochemistry
experience.location: Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description:
Achievements and Responsibilities: 
• Science education: delivered science education in international postgraduate and master's programs, both in English and Spanish. Instructed pharmacy undergraduate students in general immunology, fostering critical thinking and practical application.
• Mentorship and coaching: guided scientists and undergraduate students to achieve PhD degrees and become teaching assistants, supporting their academic and professional development.

element.headline: Medical & Scientific Communications Specialist | Immunology Lover | Passionate Ailurophile🐈 | Rock concerts fan🎶 | Cycling Enthusiast🚴🏼‍♀️
element.about:
• I am a curiosity-driven woman who has achieved several lifelong career goals, including completing a PhD as a scientist, fulfilling two research internships abroad and managing a research group of three people for almost 10 years. I have also successfully transitioned from academia to industry recently.
• My professional aim is to leverage my expertise in immunology and scientific communication skills in medical affairs roles or related positions, such as medical writing, particularly in medcoms or scientific writing, to significantly contribute to patient care.
• My personal goal is to relocate and live in my dream destination, and I am so proud to say that I have recently accomplished this goal ❤️.
• I stand out for my resourcefulness and my exceptional organizational skills. My proactive approach ensures that I effectively manage and optimize every project I undertake.

Career Achievements:

• Accomplished medical writer and science communicator: published over 20 manuscripts in international peer-reviewed journals and delivered numerous lectures as a professional speaker.
• Internationally-trained research scientist with over 15 years of experience in immunology: extensive background establishing collaborations with physicians, writing, publishing and reviewing scientific manuscripts, speaking at conferences and lectures contributing to scientific discourse and healthcare professional education, mentoring PhD students, and managing research projects.
• Proud university professor with over 15 years of experience in immunology: expert in teaching undergraduate and postgraduate students, effectively translating scientific and medical content for diverse audiences, and staying current with the latest research and developments.

experience.position: Medical Writer MedComms. Scientific Editorial Project Specialist
experience.description:
As part of the medical communications and editorial team, I collaborate across different stages of medical writing and scientific publishing workflow. My role includes scientific editorial support, scientific manuscript editing, end-to-end publication process management and scientific content development. I contribute to execution of medical-scientific projects, ensuring clarity, accuracy, and compliance with journals and industry standards across all deliverables.

#MedicalWriting #MedComms #ScientificCommunication #ContentDevelopment #Research #EditorialPublishing

experience.position: Research Scientist at CONICET (National Scientific and Technical Research Council)

experience.description:
Achievements and Responsibilities: 
• Relationship development: collaborated closely with key opinion leaders (KOLs) to advance research projects.
• Scientific expertise: demonstrated strong scientific and clinical background with proficiency in data interpretation and medical writing. Skilled in summarizing medical and scientific information in a clear and concise manner. 
• Medical writing: experience in writing, editing, and evaluating scientific and medical content (manuscripts, abstracts, posters, presentations). Published 20+ high-impact scientific publications.
• Scientific communication: presented scientific and clinical data at conferences and medical meetings as a professional speaker for healthcare professionals (HCPs), ensuring clear and accurate understanding of the information. Created educational materials and developed slide decks tailored for healthcare professionals. 
• Project management: led research projects and supervised the work of PhD students and other researchers.

headline: MA Entrepreneurship and Tourism - Marketing - Hospitality - Consultancy
about:
I am Maria Paz, a creative, purpose-driven professional with 8+ years of international experience in project management, partnerships, and community-building across Europe, the US, and Latin America. I’ve led cross-cultural teams, designed programs, and supported initiatives that bring people together around cultural, social, and environmental goals. 

Today, I’m especially drawn to initiatives that connect people with place, meaning, and shared purpose, and I would love to collaborate with organizations that want to inspire, engage, and create impact, whether through cultural projects, art, music, or social innovation.

I’m open to opportunities with NGOs, creative companies, and mission-driven media or cultural organizations, where I can bring my skills in partnerships, communications, and project leadership to strengthen programs and expand their reach.

experience.description:
- Manage the successful opening and daily operations of residential properties, ensuring
smooth operations and high tenant satisfaction while balancing multiple priorities,
timelines, and resources.
- Develop and execute strategies to enhance the resident experience, leveraging digital
management tools and collaborating with IT, marketing, and sales teams.
- Organize events, networking opportunities, and virtual engagement through community
apps to foster strong resident connections and community development.

Development and improvement of operations, marketing and
sales, IT systems, F&B, staff recruiting, training and supervising
processes for businesses in the hospitality industry

experience.companyName: Modesto Godoy - Modesto Civit - La Social Pizzeria
experience.description:
- Business strategy development and successful execution in three different restaurant ventures
- Supervision of all operations so that standards are excellently met
- Achievement of company objectives in service standards and continuous strive to develop innovative ideas
- Talent recruiting, training and team building
- Sales and marketing
- Public relations and events management
- Business information analysis
- Resources and revenue management

Responsible for the smooth running of the restaurant operations
Reception and placement of guests
Advising guests as well as targeted additional sales of products
Telephone support
Employee management, training of new employees, apprenticeship training
One month of professional training in hotel operations, from Guest Experience, Reservations, W/W departments to Housekeeping, HR, and Sales, among others

Played an integral role in new business pitches and held responsibility for the effective on-boarding of new international clients.
Responsible for the development and achievement of sales through the direct sales channel.
Focused on growing and developing existing clients, together with generating new business.

education.fieldOfStudy: School of Hotel and Tourism Management

education.insights: Grade: Entrepreneurship & Tourism - Major in Marketing Management & Tourism

volunteering.description:
Community activity regarding environmental issues, health, education, culture and social action in private and public fields

Actividad comunitaria en materia ambiental, de salud, de educación, de cultura y de acción social en el ámbito público y privado.

I would love to have her in my team forever.

headline: Life Sciences Research Consultant. Medical and Regulatory Writer. HEOR. Patients Reported Outcomes. Pharmacoeconomics
about:
For over 15 years, I have collaborated with medical science and business professionals to conceive, develop, and disseminate health research projects across multiple countries. 

My work primarily focuses on chronic, progressive, and serious diseases, as well as exploring the perspectives of patients, healthcare professionals, and other key stakeholders on illness and treatments. 

My experience spans consultancy, public health policy, and health science research, where I have honed my ability to address the diverse needs of stakeholders and navigate the intricacies of science-based information and regulatory requirements in the healthcare sector. 

I have been deeply involved in creating, writing, and delivering a wide range of research projects and documents, including protocols, reports, abstracts, manuscripts, value dossiers, policy and service implementation plans, and training materials tailored for healthcare professionals, managers, and policymakers.

I strive to offer a unique balance of scientific medical expertise and strong written communication skills in a role I am deeply passionate about. I would be delighted to connect and explore potential collaborations.
